mapper.insert: insert into reservation(mb_no, rsv_number, rsv_time, rsv_tableNo, rsv_input_time, rsv_update_time, rsv_cancel) values(#{mbNo.mbNo},#{rsvNumber},#{rsvTime},#{rsvTableNo},#{rsvInputTime},#{rsvUpdateTime},#{rsvCancel})
mapper.select: select * from member_reservation where mb_tel like concat('%',#{mbTel},'%')
select * from member_reservation where rsv_time like concat(#{date},'%')
select * from member_reservation where rsv_time like concat(#{date},'%') and mb_no=#{mbNo}
select * from member_reservation where rsv_time=#{rsvTime} and rsv_tableNo=#{rsvTableNo}
select * from member_reservation4 where rsv_time between subtime(#{rsvTime},'0:29:0') and addtime(#{rsvTime},'0:29:0')
select * from member_reservation3 where timediff(rsv_time, now())>0;
